messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Dairy/wheat free
messages.msgSnippet: Sure!  I ll just post this info to the list in case anyone else is interested.  Here is the web
messages.messageBody:
<<Could you send that along to me as well? Thanks

lovemary>>

Sure! I'll just post this info to the list in case anyone else is
interested. Here is the web site for Tip World. There are several
services you can sign up for but this is the only one I've kept:
Vegetarian Recipes. So, just go to the site and then click on
"Vegetarian Recipes" and they will begin sending, the come with
advertising but nothin's free. *grin*

http://www.topica.com/tipworld

Kris
